extensionDescription.message: Brings a conversation view to a Thunderbird near you!

options.expand_who.description: Options - label for which messages should be expanded.

options.expand_auto.description: Options - label for automatically expanding messages.

options.expand_auto.tooltip.message: If the thread is collapsed, expand all unread messages or the last message. If it is expanded, only expand the selected message in the message list.
options.expand_auto.tooltip.description: Options - tooltip for automatically expanding messages.

options.expand_none.description: Options - label for not expanding messages.

options.expand_all.description: Options - label for expanding all messages.

options.quoting_desc.message: Quotes higher than this number of lines will be collapsed.

options.hide_sigs_desc.message: Whether signatures are collapsed by default.

options.friendly_date_title.description: Options - title for if to show friendly dates.

options.friendly_date_desc.message: In the top right corner, use "normal" dates, just like the message list, instead of "yesterday" and others.
options.friendly_date_desc.description: Options - description for if to show friendly dates.

options.tweak_chrome_title.description: Options - title for tweaking chrome fonts.

options.tweak_chrome_desc.message: Scale down the font size for the conversation chrome (recommended, requires restart).
options.tweak_chrome_desc.description: Options - description for tweaking chrome fonts.

options.tweak_bodies_title.description: Options - title for tweaking message body fonts.

options.tweak_bodies_desc.message: Tweak the fonts in the message bodies to make them consistent with the outer font (recommended, requires restart).
options.tweak_bodies_desc.description: Options - description for tweaking message body fonts.

options.operate_on_conversations_desc.message: Toolbar buttons should archive and delete the entire conversation, not just selected messages.

options.extra_attachments_desc.message: In some corner cases, Thunderbird will fail to recognize some attachments. This option allows you to workaround the Thunderbird bug, and makes sure we try to display as many attachments as we can. Use in combination with the Show All Body Parts addon.

options.compose_in_tab_title.description: Options - title for hidden compose window enabling.

options.compose_in_tab_desc.message: Ctrl-Shift-N opens the hidden, unsupported composition window in a new tab
options.compose_in_tab_desc.description: Options - description for hidden compose window enabling.

options.debugging_desc.message: Enable debug output in the system console and the error console. This will generate a lot of messages.

assistant.title.description: The document title of the assistant page.

assistant.p1.message: За да направим живота Ви по-лесен, този помощник ще промени Вашите настройки на Thunderbird, така че да сме сигурни, че ще получите най-доброто и няма да бъдете разочаровани!
assistant.p1.description: First detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.p2.message: Промените, които ще направим, са обратими, така че не се притеснявайте – ако Thunderbird Разговори не Ви хареса, ние ще възстановим всички настройки, които сме променили, когато деинсталирате разширението.
assistant.p2.description: Second detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.p3.message: Това може да отнеме известно време. Можете да почакате този прозорец да се затвори или да го затворите сами и да следите напредъка в Инструменти > Управление на активността.
assistant.p3.description: Third detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.working.description: An indication that the assistant is working.

assistant.review.description: The review button title for the assistant.

assistant.apply.description: The apply button title for the assistant.

assistant.settings.description: The settings section legend for the assistant.

assistant.actionEnableGloda.message: Увери се, че глобалното търсене и индексиране е включено.

assistant.actionDontExpand.message: В списъка със съобщения, не разгъвай разговорите, съдържащи непрочетени съобщения.
assistant.actionDontExpand.description: Option text for not expanding message threads.

assistant.actionAttachmentsInline.message: Не показвай притурките в самите писма (силно препоръчително).
assistant.actionAttachmentsInline.description: Option text for showing attachments inline.

assistant.actionOfflineDownload.message: Входящите и изходящите съобщение се синхронизират за локално съхранение (силно препоръчително).
assistant.actionOfflineDownload.description: Option text for allowing offline download.

assistant.actionUnifiedInboxSearchesSent.message: Обединената папка „входящи“ претърсва и изходящите папки (силно препоръчително).
assistant.actionUnifiedInboxSearchesSent.description: Option text for adding sent to the unified inbox.

assistant.actionSetupView.message: Превключи към обединена папка „входящи“, направи изгледа по теми, подреди по дата, включи колоната за брой непрочетени и новата колона „между“ (силно препоръчително).
assistant.actionSetupView.description: Option text for how the view is set.

assistant.actionSetupViewDefaults.message: Използвай тези настройки за подреждане при всички папки.
assistant.actionSetupViewDefaults.description: Option text for setting the view defaults.

assistant.actionEnsureMessagePaneVisible.message: Увери се, че панелът за писмата е видим.
assistant.actionEnsureMessagePaneVisible.description: Option text for ensuring the message pane is visible.

assistant.settings2.message: Ако искате да включите още от тези настройки по-късно, можете да намерите този съветник в настройките на добавката, в раздела „разширени“.
assistant.settings2.description: Paragraph informing users of the ability to change settings later.

gallery.messageMovedOrDeleted.message: Съжаляваме, но не можем да покажем този изглед от тип „галерия“, тъй като съобщението е било преместено или изтрито.
gallery.messageMovedOrDeleted.description: Message displayed if the email that the gallery is trying to view cannot be found.

gallery.title.description: The tab title for the image gallery

options.start_setup_assistant.description: Title of the button to open the setup assistant.

message.movedOrDeletedConversation.message: Съжаляваме, но не можем да покажем този разговор, тъй като съобщенията са били преместени или изтрити.
message.movedOrDeletedConversation.description: Error message for the conversation tab

contact.copyEmailTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the copy email to clipboard button

contact.createFilterTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the create filter for contact button

contact.addContactTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the add contact button

contact.editContactTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the edit contact button

contact.sendEmailTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the send email button

contact.recentConversationsTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the recent conversations button

message.archive.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the archive button in the conversation header

message.detach.tooltip.message: Показване на този разговор в нов подпрозорец
message.detach.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the detach to new tab button in the conversation header

message.expand.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the expand button in the conversation header

message.forwardConversation.description: The link text for forwarding a conversation

message.junk.tooltip.message: Преместване на това съобщение в кошчето
message.junk.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the junk button in the conversation header

message.loading.description: Displayed when the message is loading

message.printConversation.description: The link text for printing a conversation

message.read.tooltip.message: Превключване на състоянието на прочетеност за всички съобщения
message.read.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the mark as read button in the conversation header

message.trash.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the trash button in the conversation header

message.noSubject.description: Displayed when a message has no subject

message.showDetails.tooltip.description: Tooltip for showing message header details

message.hideDetails.tooltip.description: Tooltip for hiding message header details

action.archive.description: Archive button name in the message more menu

action.delete.description: Delete button name in the message more menu

action.viewClassic.description: Show in classic view button name in the message more menu

action.viewSource.message: преглед на изходния код на съобщението
action.viewSource.description: View source button name in the message more menu

notification.scamMsg.message: Това съобщение може да е измамно:
notification.scamMsg.description: Notification message shown for a junk/scam message

notification.ignoreScamWarning.description: Button title to ignore a junk/scam message

notification.junkMsg.description: Notification message shown for junk messages

notification.notJunk.description: Button title to mark as not junk

notification.isOutboxMsg.description: Notification message shown for a message in the outbox

notification.sendUnsent.description: Button title to send a message in the outbox

notification.remoteContentBlockedMsg.description: Notification message shown when remote content is blocked

notification.showRemote.description: Button title to show remote content

notification.alwaysShowRemote.description: Button title to always show remote content.

action.editDraft.description: Edit draft button name in the message more menu

action.reply.description: Reply button name in the message more menu

action.replyAll.description: Reply all button name in the message more menu

action.replyList.description: Reply list button name in the message more menu

action.editNew.description: Edit as new button name in the message more menu

action.forward.description: Forward button name in the message more menu

message.fromHeader.description: Header name displayed for the from field

message.toHeader.description: Header name displayed for the to field

message.ccHeader.description: Header name displayed for the cc field
